node.name: prayerReminderChromeExtension
node.description: The Chrome Prayer Reminder Plugin is a tool that allows you to receive prayer times for any location and receive notifications within 60 minutes of each prayer time. With this plugin, you can stay on top of your daily prayer routine and never miss a prayer time.
